Translations.Text: “Chikafika chipulumutso cha Allah ndi kugonjetsa (mzinda wa Makka kwa iwe ndi okutsatira)
“Ndikuwaona anthu akulowa m’chipembedzo cha Allah ali magulumagulu
“Pamenepo lemekeza Mbuye wako ndi kumtamanda ndiponso mpemphe chikhululuko, ndipo ndithu Iye ndiwolandira mochuluka kulapa (kwa anthu Ake)
